# Changelog

## v0.4.2 - 2022-12-20

- Updated for latest Gleam version.

## v0.4.1 - 2022-12-20

- Updated for latest Gleam version.
- Added support for the Connection Options.

## v0.3.1 - 2022-11-11

- Updated for latest Gleam version.

## v0.3.0 - 2022-08-07

- Added support for binary WebSocket frames

## v0.2.0 - 2022-04-10

- Upgraded `gleam_http` to v3.0.0. (#3)
